name: Cease the Day
description:
Finally, the perfect plan! With this, the tyranny of day will be gone! The sun will sleep... Forever!

Blow away all lamps, jump over wooden carts and dodge garlic barrels in this endless runner to bring about eternal darkness! It's time to Cease the Day!

-

His name is Not Important.

Wait, no. DOCTOR Notin Portant, PH.D. in astrology!

A respected professional in his field, determined to uncover the truth of the stars. And he's also a vampire.

His ultimate plan is to make a vampire utopia, by doing what should have been done ages ago... Make the sun fall asleep forever! How, you ask?

It's obvious: Blow out all lanterns of the city so they don't wake up the sun, tricking it to sleep forever! (Yes he isn't all that bright)

--

HOW TO PLAY

  • Press [A] or [D] to move left or right
  • Press [Space] to jump
  • Use Left Mouse Button/Q to turn off lamps on your left
  • Use Right Mouse Button/E to turn off lamps on your right
  • Keep an eye out on your life remaining
  • Pick up potions to grab a 1up! 

This project was built for the GJL Game Parade 2020.
